description: Explore the southern portion of Kananaskis Country. Features detailed maps, accurate hiking trails with distances, and details such as logging roads, campgrounds, equestrian routes, picnic areas, and fire lookouts. On the back are descriptions and photos of 16 recommended day hikes, three overnight trips, and nine classic mountain bike rides, as well as six recommended trails for novice and intermediate snowshoers and two areas recommended for cross-country skiing.
name: Gem Trek Publishing Kananaskis Lakes Map
